column4: Folks, can I say something?  I've been using Linux since 1992 (SLS 0.96, woo).  I've had my ups and downs.  About 20 minutes ago I installed Ubuntu, and it is the best freaking Linux that I have ever used.  Seriously.
my biggest problem is getting any linux dist to support a 85 key keyboard
ur thinkpad KB has how many keys
